data.text: @DebjaniBhatta20 @barandbench It is your choice to take Vaccine or Not take... You cannot speak or make decisions on behalf of other Indians...Do you know anything about Vaxx Adverse Events?? World Standard is for Stupid People who only watch News...Turn Off your TV and do some research
@umamaheshwarb @barandbench @pbhushan1 Read what the book says and then blabber something....

@DebjaniBhatta20 @barandbench Show the virus that caused this pandemic. No *control experiment* ever done anywhere... SCAMDEMIC‼️

FOIs reveal that health/science institutions around the world (177 and counting!) have no record of SARS-COV-2 isolation/purification, anywhere, ever: https://t.co/D2k1G4FqYl

@Dr_arastu007 @barandbench @pbhushan1 You cannot give a reason why a jabbed person is afraid of an unjabbed person? And you think Immunity comes only with a Jab? Does the textbook say so, or Fauci said so?

@umamaheshwarb @barandbench @pbhushan1 Go and read ...no point in discussing here.
Atleast get a basic text book "Preventive and social medicine" by Park
@Dr_arastu007 @barandbench @pbhushan1 Can you answer the simple question, why is a jabbed man afraid of an unjabbed man? Where does herd immunity come in?
@umamaheshwarb @barandbench @pbhushan1 First read something on epidemology....and then discuss. Have you heard the term "herd immunity"
@Dr_arastu007 @barandbench @pbhushan1 So, if the jabbed are well protected, why fear the unjabbed?
